forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco breathes softly beneath a canvas of partly clouded skies, the chill of night clinging to the air as the temperature hovers comfortably around forty-seven degrees. As dawn unfolds, the promise of a mostly sunny Saturday beckons. By mid-day, temperatures will gently descend to around fifty-three, ushering in a day that feels both crisp and serene. A light north-northwest breeze whispers through the streets, offering just enough refreshment to invigorate the senses without turning brisk.

For those venturing out, layering will serve you well; a light sweater or jacket could be your best companion as the cool air mingles with the sunlight. It’s a splendid day to wander through the less-traveled paths of the city—perhaps a stroll along the quieter parts of the waterfront or an exploration through the quaint nooks of nearby neighborhoods. There’s joy in savoring a warm cup of coffee al fresco, sitting under the emerging sun while the world begins to stir. The city’s gentle transition from night to day carries an understated beauty that invites reflection and appreciation for the simple pleasures in life.
